headline: RadNet (RDNT) Valuation Check After Short-Seller Allegations and Supportive Analyst Rebuttal
summary: RadNet (RDNT) has been on a roller coaster after a sharp selloff triggered by a Hunterbrook Capital short report, followed quickly by a supportive strong buy reiteration from Raymond James that helped calm nerves. See our latest analysis for RadNet. Even with the recent whiplash around the short report and bullish rebuttal, RadNet’s $76.68 share price still sits on a solid foundation, with a roughly flat 3 month share price return and a standout multi year total shareholder return. This...
